name: Costco Mac and Cheese
description: Love Costco Mac and Cheese and want to recreate it at home? Get the easy copycat recipe to make macaroni and cheese like Costco.
instructions: Preheat the oven to 400°F.Cook the pasta in salted water according to the package directions for al dente. Drain, but do not rinse the pasta.While the pasta is cooking, melt the butter in a saucepan over medium heat. Add the garlic and cook until fragrant, 1 to 2 minutes.Slowly add the flour and stir until well combined. Cook, stirring frequently, for 1 minute.In a small bowl, mix together the milk, cream, salt and pepper. Pour the mixture into the saucepan in a slow, steady stream, stirring constantly. Bring the mixture to a boil. Then reduce the heat to a simmer and cook until thickened, about 5 minutes.Remove the saucepan from the heat. Stri in the Parmesan and Romano cheeses until melted. If desired, add additional salt and pepper to taste.Add the cooked pasta to the saucepan, and stir to coat. Transfer the pasta to a 13×9 baking dish. Top the pasta with the grated cheddar cheese.Bake, uncovered, for 15 to 20 minutes, until the cheese is melted and the sauce is bubbly.
